Burn.display_help: All foes that pass through these flames will be burned.
Burn.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning.

Flares.display_help: You launch several bursts of energy at your target, scorching their soul. The target suffers energy damage while their soul burns, causing negative energy damage over time.
Flares.display_short_help: Ranged, Minor DMG(Energy), Minor DoT(Negative Energy)
Flares.display_target_help: You are suffering negative energy damage over time.

Fire_Blast.display_help: You fire a large burst of energy at your target, burning their soul. The target suffers energy damage, while their soul continues to burn, causing negative energy damage over time. The strength of the energy burst is so large that it creates a scorching patch of fire on the ground.
Fire_Blast.display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DMG(Energy), Moderate DoT(Negative Energy/Fire)
Fire_Blast.display_target_help: You are suffering negative energy damage over time.

Blaze.display_help: This devastating attack scorches your target with a deadly burst of energy that burns their soul. The target suffers energy damage, while their burning soul causes negative energy damage over time.
Blaze.display_short_help: Ranged, High DMG(Energy), Moderate DoT(Negative Energy)
Blaze.display_target_help: You are suffering negative energy damage over time.

Imbue.display_help: Heals a single targeted ally by cauterizing their wounds. You cannot use this power to heal yourself. Recharge: Fast

Enlightenment.display_help: You create an aura of energy which floods the mind of your targets, showing them visions of enlightenment that overwhelm their senses. Affected targets are held in place and suffer psionic damage due to the strength of the visions.
Enlightenment.display_target_help: You have been held in place and cannot move.

Lightstaff_Bolt.display_help: You fire a bolt of magical energy from your staff at a single target. The magical bolt causes energy damage and scorches the target's soul, causing negative energy damage over time.
Lightstaff_Bolt.display_short_help: Ranged, High DMG (Energy), High DoT (Negative Energy), -ToHit(Foe)
Lightstaff_Bolt.display_target_help: You are suffering negative energy damage over time and a reduced chance to hit.

Haunt.display_help: You summon a pair of shades from the Netherworld to harass your target. Shades deal moderate damage and terrorize their victims.

Shadow_Field.display_help: You blanket a targeted area in darkness, afflicting your main target with negative energy damage. Any foe who enters this area will have their chance to hit reduced and has a chance to be held for a short period of time.
Shadow_Field.display_short_help: Targeted AoE, Moderate DMG(Negative Energy), -ToHit (Foe), Chance for Hold (Foe)
Shadow_Field.display_target_help: You are suffering a reduced chance to hit. You may also be held in place and unable to move.

Light_The_Path.display_help: All foes that pass through these flames will be burned.
Light_The_Path.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning.

Jawbreaker.display_help: This upward swing attempts to shatter your opponent's will to live, causing smashing damage. The target's soul is scorched, causing negative energy damage over time. It also has a chance to send him flying upwards into the air.
Jawbreaker.display_short_help: Melee, High DMG(Smashing), Moderate DoT (Negative Energy), Chance for Knockup
Jawbreaker.display_target_help: You are suffering negative energy damage over time.

Clobber.display_help: You Clobber your foe with a massive swing of your mace. This attack deals exceptional damage and can leave most opponents disoriented for a period of time. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
Clobber.display_target_help: You are staggered and suffer from reduced attack speed and chance to hit.

Crowd_Control.display_help: You swing your mace and unleash a bolt of energy at a single target. The target suffers energy damage when struck.. The attack also scorches the soul of affected target, causing negative energy damage over time. There is also a chance that the blow knocks the target down.
Crowd_Control.display_short_help: Ranged, High DMG(Energy), Moderate DoT (Negative Energy), Chance for Knockback
Crowd_Control.display_target_help: You are suffering negative energy damage over time.

Radiance.display_help: You can send a bolt of electricity through multiple opponents, causing a muscle spasm and dealing minor damage. Each foe is knocked down, and the electric charge can fork several times, jumping to several opponents rapidly. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate
Radiance.display_target_help: Your recovery has been reduced and some endurance has been drained.

Radiance.display_help: You can send a bolt of electricity through multiple opponents, causing a muscle spasm and dealing minor damage. Each foe is knocked down, and the electric charge can fork several times, jumping to several opponents rapidly. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate
Radiance.display_target_help: Your recovery has been reduced and some endurance has been drained.

Radiance.display_help: You can send a bolt of electricity through multiple opponents, causing a muscle spasm and dealing minor damage. Each foe is knocked down, and the electric charge can fork several times, jumping to several opponents rapidly. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate
Radiance.display_target_help: Your recovery has been reduced and some endurance has been drained.

Damage_MN.display_help: The Drudges have a set of natural affinities that make them stronger against some forms of damage and weaker against others.
Damage_MN.display_target_help: The Drudges have a set of natural affinities that make them stronger against some forms of damage and weaker against others.

Damage_LT.display_help: The Drudges have a set of natural affinities that make them stronger against some forms of damage and weaker against others.
Damage_LT.display_target_help: The Drudges have a set of natural affinities that make them stronger against some forms of damage and weaker against others.

Damage_BS.display_help: The Drudges have a set of natural affinities that make them stronger against some forms of damage and weaker against others.
Damage_BS.display_target_help: The Drudges have a set of natural affinities that make them stronger against some forms of damage and weaker against others.

Damage_EB.display_help: The Drudges have a set of natural affinities that make them stronger against some forms of damage and weaker against others.
Damage_EB.display_target_help: The Drudges have a set of natural affinities that make them stronger against some forms of damage and weaker against others.

Damage_AV.display_help: The Drudges have a set of natural affinities that make them stronger against some forms of damage and weaker against others.
Damage_AV.display_target_help: The Drudges have a set of natural affinities that make them stronger against some forms of damage and weaker against others.

Shadow_Punch.display_help: You wrap your fists with Negative Energy channeled from the Netherworlds, then perform a quick punch that deals minor damage. Shadow Punches cloud the target's vision, lowering his chance to hit for a short time.
Shadow_Punch.display_target_help: Your chance to hit has been reduced.

Resistance.display_help: Shades take less damage from Negative Energy attacks, can jump quite high, and can travel quickly.

Scare.display_help: You entwine a single foe within their deepest fears and cause them to helplessly tremble for a brief while.

Claw_Swipe.display_help: The Umbra Beast lashes out with its claws and causes a high amount of lethal and negative energy damage. Additionally, the target may suffer from bleeding and suffer additional lethal damage over time. Damage: High, Recharge: Fast
Claw_Swipe.display_short_help: Melee, Heavy DMG(Lethal/Negative), Foe Minor DoT(Lethal)
Claw_Swipe.display_target_help: You are bleeding from the Umbra Beast's Claw Swipe!

Resistance.display_help: The Umbra Beast is highly resistant to Cold and Negative Energy, but is also slightly resistant to all forms of damage.

Incandescent_Strike.display_help: You strike your target with a forceful blow that strikes at their very soul. The affected target suffers energy and negative energy damage, along with reduced defenses. Flying targets are knocked to the ground. Additionally, the target may be knocked down.
Incandescent_Strike.display_short_help: Melee, Superior DMG(Energy/Negative Energy), -DEF(Foe, All), -Fly(Foe), Chance for Knockdown
Incandescent_Strike.display_target_help: Your defenses have been reduced and you are unable to fly.

Gleaming_Bolt.display_help: You strike your target with a bolt of energy which strikes the soul of your target. The affected target suffers both energy and negative energy damage, as well as from reduced defenses.

Proton_Scatter.display_help: You create a stream of energy that strikes at the soul of several targets before you. The affected targets suffer both energy and negative energy damage, as well as a reduction in their defenses.

Dawns_Light.display_help: You ensnare targets around you in a burst of energy which scorches their soul. The targets suffer energy damage and continued negative energy damage over time. Additionally, the targets will suffer from reduced defense against all types of damage and may be knocked down.
Dawns_Light.display_short_help: PBAoE, High DMG (Energy), High DoT (Negative Energy), -DEF(Foe, All), Chance for Knockdown
Dawns_Light.display_target_help: You are suffering negative energy damage over time and reduced defense against all forms of damage.

Light_the_Path.display_help: You create a mobile mass of burning soul energy which chases down an enemy target. As the soul energy moves toward a target, it leaves a chain of other fiery patches in its wake. Opponents caught in these patches will suffer damage over time.

Trap_Soul.display_help: You ensnare the soul of a single target, holding them in place for a short period of time.
Trap_Soul.display_target_help: You have been held and are unable to move.

Elucidate.display_help: You create powerful visions in the mind of your target, eliciting confusion and causing psionic damage.

Radiance.display_help: You can send a bolt of electricity through multiple opponents, causing a muscle spasm and dealing minor damage. Each foe is knocked down, and the electric charge can fork several times, jumping to several opponents rapidly. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate
Radiance.display_target_help: Your recovery has been reduced and some endurance has been drained.

Summon_Lantern.display_help: You conjure a pair of ghostly lanterns from the depths of the Netherworld.

Soul_Beast.display_help: You conjure up a Soul Beast from the Netherworld. This creature will fight beside its summoner using its brutal claw, bite and darkness attacks.

Living_Shadows.display_help: You extend and animate your own shadow, causing it to entangle all foes within a cone in front of you. Affected targets suffer negative energy damage over time and reduced chance to hit. Additionally, affected targets are immobilized and unable to fly.
Living_Shadows.display_target_help: You have been immobilized and are unable to fly. Additionally, you are suffering a reduced chance to hit.

Crack_Whip.display_help: You channel energy into the creation of a magical whip, which is then cracked in an impressive sweep. This causes energy damage and scorches the target's soul, causing negative energy damage over time. Affected targets will also suffer reduced resistance to all forms of damage and may be knocked down.
Crack_Whip.display_short_help: Melee (Long Cone), Moderate DMG(Energy), Minor DoT(Negative Energy), -RES(Foe, All), Chance for Knockdown
Crack_Whip.display_target_help: You are suffering negative energy damage over time and reduced resistance to all forms of damage.

Corruption.display_help: You lash out with your whip, firing a bolt of energy from its tip. This burst causes energy damage and scorches your target's soul, causing negative energy damage. Additionally, the affected target suffers from reduced resistance to all forms of damage.
Corruption.display_short_help: Melee (Long), Minor DMG(Energy), Minor DoT(Negative Energy), -RES(Foe, All)
Corruption.display_target_help: You are suffering negative energy damage over time and reduced resistance to all forms of damage.

Nether_Whip.display_help: You create a powerful whip of energy and lash out at your foe, causing energy damage. The target's soul is scorched, causing negative energy damage over time. Additionally, the target's resistance against all forms of damage is reduced and there is a chance they will be knocked down.
Nether_Whip.display_short_help: Melee (Long), Moderate DMG(Energy), Minor DoT(Negative Energy), -RES(Foe, All), Chance for Knockdown
Nether_Whip.display_target_help: You are suffering negative energy damage over time and reduced resistance to all forms of damage.
